item.title: Thinking about 3FS
item.description: Rise to Prominence: 3FS In the past two months, DeepSeek’s popularity has skyrocketed. What particularly delights us storage professionals is that DeepSeek has brought distributed storage, which has long been hidden away, to the forefront. The GitHub attention that 3FS has received is unprecedented among open-source distributed storage projects, and there probably won’t be another like it. The star count in just 3 days after open-sourcing exceeded that of numerous open-source storage projects that have been cultivating for years.
